item.text: Therefore, since we have been declared righteous by faith, we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ,

<st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> we <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">obtained</st> <st data-num="4318" class="">access</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> we <st data-num="2476" class="">stand</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> we <st data-num="2744" class="">rejoice</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="1680" class="">hope</st> of <st data-num="2316">Godâ€™s</st> <st data-num="1391">glory</st>.

<st data-num="3756">Not</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3441">only</st> this, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> we <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="2744" class="">rejoice</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2347" class="">sufferings</st>, <st data-num="1492" class="">knowing</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="2347" class="">suffering</st> <st data-num="2716" class="">produces</st> <st data-num="5281" class="">endurance</st>,

<st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5281" class="">endurance</st>, <st data-num="1382" class="">character</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1382" class="">character</st>, <st data-num="1680" class="">hope</st>.
And hope does not disappoint, because the love of God has been poured out in our hearts through the Holy Spirit who was given to us.
For while we were still helpless, at the right time Christ died for the ungodly.

(<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3433" class="">rarely</st> will <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="599" class="">die</st> <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> a <st data-num="1342">righteous person</st>, though <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> a <st data-num="18">good person</st> <st data-num="5029" class="">perhaps</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">someone</st> might possibly <st data-num="5111" class="">dare</st> to <st data-num="599">die</st>.)<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="4921" class="">demonstrates</st> <st data-num="1438">his own</st> <st data-num="26" class="">love</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>, <st data-num="3754">in that</st> while <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="2089" class="">still</st> <st data-num="268" class="">sinners</st>, <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="599" class="">died</st> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>.

<st data-num="4183" class="">Much</st> <st data-num="3123" class="">more</st> <st data-num="3767" class="">then</st>, because we have <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> been <st data-num="1344">declared righteous</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st>,<n id="2" /> we will be <st data-num="4982" class="">saved</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> Godâ€™s <st data-num="3709" class="">wrath</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> while we <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="2190" class="">enemies</st> we were <st data-num="2644" class="">reconciled</st> to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> the <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st>, <st data-num="4183">how much</st> <st data-num="3123" class="">more</st>, since we have been <st data-num="2644" class="">reconciled</st>, will we be <st data-num="4982" class="">saved</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st>?
Not only this, but we also rejoice in God through our Lord Jesus Christ, through whom we have now received this reconciliation.
So then, just as sin entered the world through one man and death through sin, and so death spread to all people because all sinnedâ€”

<st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> <st data-num="891">before</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> was given,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> there is <st data-num="3361" class="">no</st> <st data-num="1677" class="">accounting</st> for <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st><n id="2" /> when there <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">no</st> <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st>.

<st data-num="235" class="">Yet</st> <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st> <st data-num="936" class="">reigned</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="76" class="">Adam</st> <st data-num="3360" class="">until</st> <st data-num="3475" class="">Moses</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">even</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">over</st> those who did <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="264" class="">sin</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3667">the same way</st> that <st data-num="76" class="">Adam</st> (<st data-num="3739">who</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> a <st data-num="5179" class="">type</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="3195" class="">coming</st> one) <st data-num="3847" class="">transgressed</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="5486">gracious gift</st> is <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="3900" class="">transgression</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1487" class="">if</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="599" class="">died</st> through <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="3900" class="">transgression</st> of <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> man,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="4183" class="">how much</st> <st data-num="3123" class="">more</st> did <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="1431" class="">gift</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st> of <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="4052" class="">multiply</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st>!

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> the <st data-num="1434">gift</st> is <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> the <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> who <st data-num="264" class="">sinned</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="2917" class="">judgment</st>, resulting <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> transgression,<n id="2" /> led <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2631" class="">condemnation</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st><n id="3" /> the <st data-num="5486">gracious gift</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="3900" class="">failures</st><n id="4" /> led <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1345" class="">justification</st>.

For if, by the transgression of the one man, death reigned through the one, how much more will those who receive the abundance of grace and of the gift of righteousness reign in life through the one, Jesus Christ!
Consequently, just as condemnation for all people came through one transgression, so too through the one righteous act came righteousness leading to life for all people.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="5618">just as</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> the <st data-num="3876" class="">disobedience</st> of the <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="444">man</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st><n id="2" /> were <st data-num="2525" class="">constituted</st> <st data-num="268" class="">sinners</st>, <st data-num="3779" class="">so</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> the <st data-num="5218" class="">obedience</st> of <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> man<n id="3" /> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st><n id="4" /> will be <st data-num="2525" class="">constituted</st> <st data-num="1342" class="">righteous</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">Now</st> the <st data-num="3551" class="">law</st> <st data-num="3922">came in</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> the <st data-num="3900" class="">transgression</st><n id="2" /> may <st data-num="4121" class="">increase</st>, <st data-num="1161">but</st> <st data-num="3757" class="">where</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st> <st data-num="5248" class="">increased</st>, <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st> <st data-num="5248">multiplied all the more</st>,
so that just as sin reigned in death, so also grace will reign through righteousness to eternal life through Jesus Christ our Lord.
